text.text:
Products Page & Custom Products Page

  • You can sort the database of products by ID, Name, Type, Description, Quantity, and Price.
  • Click on the little arrow icon next to the column header to sort either in ascending or descending order.
  • On the show entries, click the drop down arrow to display a menu of how many items to display on a page.
  • The previous and next buttons will load the next page of products.
  • Click in the Search box to search the table of products.
  • To delete an item from the database you must first select a row in the database, and then click the delete button.
  • To modify an item from the database you must first select a row in the database, and then click the edit button.

text_0.text:
Custom Products Page

  • The custom products page will only show items from the database that are customizable.
  • When adding products that are customizable, the product name should end in [CUST].
  • Example: Cool Gnome[CUST].
